item.title: Hello World Redux
item.description: For the past month (2 or 3 months??) I’ve been more than quiet - I’ve really not been around.

item.title: On being quiet – and being busy: impact on web analytics and content strategy
item.description: You may not have noticed, but I have - I’ve been quiet, and not been adding any new posts or updates to any of my WordPress plugin.

item.title: What a difference a year makes - making a fashion statement
item.description: This time last year … almost 12 months now, I was a keen follower of fashion.

item.description: There actually are many things that can de-rail a successful freelance career and perhaps these 5 should have your attention.

item.description: To me, I used Apple Maps on my iPad to check walking directions.

item.description: I’ve been using Apple Macbook Pro as my primary work horse since 2008.

item.description: Well it had to happen - I’ve found a better domain damien.

item.title: I have ADHD
item.description: I have ADHD - and I have lived with this every day of my life since junior / primary school.

item.title: Justinmind - stop with the spam comments
item.description: Since I first mentioned Axure - about 3 months back, I’ve started being harassed by a creepy socialmedia ‘person’ belonging to Justinmind.

item.title: Facebook Deleted
item.description: I did it - really did it - I deleted my Facebook account - I deactivated it first about 12 months back and then 2 weeks back I did it again.

item.title: When done is really done - Scrum - post it note management
item.description: There really is nothing better then looking at your office wall and knowing that done is done.

item.title: The latest work - Virgin Media presents
item.description: It’s here — your unmissable week ahead If you’re not with Virgin Media - then you’re missing out.

item.title: 30 minutes a day - every day to write something
item.description: 30 minutes a day - every day. That’s how much time I need once I’ve got a concept for an article to publish here.

item.title: Website re-design and planning
item.description: I’d be lying if I said ‘I never change anything on my website’.

item.description: Web Application Development can seem easy if you’re used to a shared host and WordPress running out of the box.

item.title: A couple more examples of impressive jQuery and JS
item.description: jQuery and Javascript may not be all that bad for you .

item.title: Welcome to 2012 - You made it!
item.description: Welcome to 2012 … and yes, you made it! There is no point in a retrospective, stuff happened and we learn from it.

item.title: Dead Mac Day what a struggle
item.description: Monday will now be called DEAD MAC DAY - July 4, 2011

item.title: Back from holidays - what projects do you need help with?
item.description: So after a several weeks holiday - as of now, I’m a free agent looking for new work and a new project to get stuck into.

item.title: On holiday - back next week
item.description: Hi everyone - I hope your June is going well? I’ve been away on holiday for the past week taking some time to visit colleagues and friends in Madrid.

item.title: Learning to use Google Adsense
item.description: Hi … if you’re looking at this in your RSS feed reader will now notice at the bottom of each post there is now a Google Adsense ad.

item.title: Going Mobile - I'm in your face - I'm in your phone.

item.description: I’ve made a change to my Bit.ly Pro setup and switched to the domain damiens.

item.title: Where did all those Stats Go?
item.description: Where did all my stats go! That’s a very good question - apparently I’ve been suffering from a problem that Google no longer likes my domain name.

item.description: I just updated my HTC Desire to the new Cyanogenmod 7 rom and it’s been running fine.

item.title: London Startup Weekend will be back
item.description: So London Startup Weekend will happen - it has taken a lot longer to get the next weekend event going then we all thought.

item.title: I have a bug - Catchable Fatal Error
item.description: If you are reading this on my website (as opposed to RSS feed) you might notice that I’m suffering from a Catchable Fatal Error

item.description: So I got my copy of the new ****The Smashing Book 2.

item.title: Productivity Tip - Technical Writing - the Writer's Block
item.description: Each week I set aside time to good writing, but its not the same when each day there are technical documents and scrum artefacts to be prepared.

item.title: Productivity – Clear some time to get writing
item.description: For over a year now, Sunday has been my day to work.

item.title: Welcome 2011 time for a spring clean
item.description: Hello 2011 — long may you last! If you’re new to my site - then Hello to you too.
